data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'PO List Base'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_PO_LIST_BASE 
  as select from    I_PurchaseOrderItemAPI01       as POItem
    inner join      I_PurchaseOrderAPI01           as PO             on PO.PurchaseOrder = POItem.PurchaseOrder
    inner join      znft_t_t001                    as blgtr          on blgtr.bsart = PO.PurchaseOrderType
    left outer join I_PurOrdScheduleLineAPI01      as POScheduleLine on  POScheduleLine.PurchaseOrder             = POItem.PurchaseOrder //eket
                                                                     and POScheduleLine.PurchaseOrderItem         = POItem.PurchaseOrderItem
                                                                     and POScheduleLine.PurchaseOrderScheduleLine = '0001'
    left outer join I_PurOrdAccountAssignmentAPI01 as POAccount      on POAccount.PurchaseOrder = PO.PurchaseOrder //ekkn
    inner join      I_Product                      as Product          on Product.Product = POItem.Material
    left outer join I_ProductText                  as ProductText      on ProductText.Product = POItem.Material
                                                                      and ProductText.Language = $session.system_language
    left outer join I_ProductGroupText_2           as ProductGroupText on  ProductGroupText.Language     = $session.system_language
                                                                       and ProductGroupText.ProductGroup = Product.ProductGroup
    left outer join I_ProductTypeText              as ProductTypeText  on  ProductTypeText.Language    = $session.system_language
                                                                       and ProductTypeText.ProductType = Product.ProductType
    left outer join I_ProductPlantBasic            as ProductPlant     on  ProductPlant.Product = POItem.Material
                                                                       and ProductPlant.Plant   = POItem.Plant
    left outer join ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_SHIP_QTY as ship_qty on ship_qty.purchaseorder = POItem.PurchaseOrder
                                                          and ship_qty.purchaseorderitem = POItem.PurchaseOrderItem    
    left outer join I_Supplier on I_Supplier.Supplier = PO.Supplier                                                                                                                             
  association [0..*] to znft_t_ship_cus            as _CustomFields on  _CustomFields.purchaseorder     = POItem.PurchaseOrder
                                                                    and _CustomFields.purchaseorderitem = POItem.PurchaseOrderItem   
//  association [0..*] to znft_t_clea_cus            as _ClearenceCustomFields on  _ClearenceCustomFields.purchaseorder     = POItem.PurchaseOrder
//                                                                    and _ClearenceCustomFields.purchaseorderitem = POItem.PurchaseOrderItem                                                                                                                                              
{
  key POItem.PurchaseOrder,
  key POItem.PurchaseOrderItem,
      PO.PurchaseOrderType,
      PO.CompanyCode,
      PO.IncotermsClassification,
      PO.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      PO.PaymentTerms,
      coalesce( POItem.PurchasingDocumentDeletionCode, PO.PurchasingDocumentDeletionCode ) as loekz,
      POItem.IsStatisticalItem,
      PO.PurchasingOrganization,
      PO.PurchasingGroup,
      PO.PurchaseOrderDate,
      PO.Supplier,
      I_Supplier.SupplierName,
      PO.CreatedByUser,
      PO.CreationDate                                                                      as erdat,
      POItem.Plant,
      POItem.StorageLocation,
      coalesce( Product.ProductCategory,'')                                                as attyp,
      POItem.MaterialGroup,
      ProductGroupText.ProductGroupName                                                    as MaterialGroupText,
      coalesce(Product.ProductType,'')                                                     as mtart,
      ProductTypeText.MaterialTypeName                                                     as MaterialTypeText,
      POItem.ManufacturerMaterial,
      POItem.Material,
      coalesce( ProductText.ProductName, POItem.PurchaseOrderItemText )                  as MaterialText,
      POItem.SupplierMaterialNumber,
      POScheduleLine.Batch,
      POScheduleLine.ScheduleLineDeliveryDate,
      POItem.AccountAssignmentCategory,
      POItem.ConsumptionPosting,
      POItem.OrderItemQtyToBaseQtyDnmntr,
      POItem.OrderItemQtyToBaseQtyNmrtr,
      POItem.GoodsReceiptIsExpected,
      POItem.OverdelivTolrtdLmtRatioInPct,
      POItem.UnderdelivTolrtdLmtRatioInPct,
      POItem.UnlimitedOverdeliveryIsAllowed,
      POItem.StockType,
      POItem.PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      POItem.OrderQuantity,
      Product.BaseUnit                                                                     as mara_meins,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      POItem.NetPriceAmount,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'OrderPriceUnit'
      POItem.NetPriceQuantity,
      POItem.OrderPriceUnit,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      POItem.NetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      POItem.GrossAmount,
      PO.DocumentCurrency,
      POAccount.SalesOrder,
      POAccount.SalesOrderItem,
      POAccount.WBSElementInternalID_2,  
      PO.ReleaseIsNotCompleted, 
      PO.PurchasingCompletenessStatus,
      POItem.PurchasingDocumentDeletionCode, 
      POItem.IsCompletelyDelivered,
      POItem.InvoiceIsGoodsReceiptBased, 
      POItem.SupplierConfirmationControlKey,      
      _CustomFields.referencedocument,
      _CustomFields.referencedocumentitem,
      _CustomFields.incentivedocument,
      _CustomFields.incentivedocumentitem,
      _CustomFields.controldocument,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      _CustomFields.shipquantity,
      //( POItem.OrderQuantity - ship_qty.quantity ) as shipquantity,
       @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      case when ship_qty.quantity > 0 then ( POItem.OrderQuantity - ship_qty.quantity ) 
                                      else POItem.OrderQuantity end as shipquantity_max,
//      ( POItem.OrderQuantity  ) as shipquantity,
//      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
//      _CustomFields.netpr,
//      _CustomFields.peinh,
//      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
//      _CustomFields.netwr,
//      _CustomFields.currency,
      _CustomFields.invoicedocument,
      _CustomFields.invoicedate,
      _CustomFields.gtipno,
      _CustomFields.mensei,
      _CustomFields       
  }
